text:
Miki Muster (born Nikolaj Muster, 22 November 1925 – 7 May 2018) was a Slovenian academic sculptor, illustrator, cartoonist, and animator. He was born in Murska Sobata, Yugoslavia. In 1952, Muster started drawing his most famous comic strip "Zvitorepec", which was running in magazines "Poletove podobe in povesti" (PPP) and "Tedenska tribuna". His works were inspired by Argentine cartoonist Guillermo Mordillo.
Muster died on 7 May 2018 in a nursing home in Notranje Gorice, Slovenia of Alzheimer's disease aged 92.
